name: Acer Chromebooks
description: Due to our recent increase in team size, we are short on laptops which we use to program our robots. Currently, all laptops are provided by team members, but not everybody has one or wants to bring it to school. Having chromebooks would allow us to be even more productive. Any laptop computers would be helpful, but Chromebooks are cheap and the Operating System is easily replaced by Linux which we use for development.

name: Extension Cable
description: We have a very large room with all of the power outlets on wall. We often need to use electrical devices on the other side of the room which is extremely annoying. This extension cord would help solve this annoying issue.
